sentences.sContent: An adjective must agree with  its noun in mumber and case.
sentences.sCn: 形容词在数和格方面必须符合其所修饰的名词。

sentences.sContent: In “the black cat” the adjective “black”modifies the noun “cat”.
sentences.sCn: 在“那只黑猫”中，形容词“黑的”修饰名词“猫”。

trans.tranOther: A noun is a word such as "car," "love," or "Anne" which is used to refer to a person or thing.
